title: Un-Go
description: Shinj?r? Y?ki and Inga work together to solve mysteries in a near future timeline. This episode will depict the protagonists Shinj?r? and Inga’s first encounter. The story is based on the works of Ango Sakaguchi (Aoi Bungaku Series’ “In the Forest, Under Cherries in Full Bloom”), a post-World War II Japanese novel and essayist.
